name: Luke Segars
summary: Luke Segars is an experienced technology leader and entrepreneur, currently serving as CTO and Co-founder of Subsalt, focusing on enhancing data security and sharing. Previously, he held significant roles at Google and Passport, driving product and platform innovations.
work_history: Subsalt, Co-Founder, September 2021 - Present: Leading efforts to make sensitive data sharing safer and easier. Passport, Director of Product, Platform, August 2018 - October 2021: Oversaw product direction and strategy. Director of Data Products, November 2017 - August 2018. The Iron Yard, Instructor, September 2015 - November 2017: Taught frontend engineering. Google, Product Manager, July 2014 - September 2015: Improved YouTube's video advertising effectiveness. Associate Product Manager, September 2012 - July 2014.
project_history: Developed new ad formats for Google, enhancing music and book advertising. Contributed to IBM's virtual whiteboard plugin and involved in patent submissions. Developed automated advertisement delivery system at Digitalsmiths, with a patent pending.
skills: Java, Eclipse IDE, Eclipse Framework, customer interfacing, Microsoft Visual Studio, C++.NET, Zend Studio, PHP, HTML+CSS
education: University of California, Berkeley, Masters in Computer Science, 2010 - 2012. Clemson University, BS in Computer Science, 2005 - 2009.
